front.name: GEO Elevator Bernal
front.ability: HOME: Boost direct to Home Bernal without doubling boost costs.

back.name: Space Elevator Lab
back.ability: Your factory-assisted landings/liftoffs anywhere treat lander burns as normal Burn Spaces.

front.name: L1 Climate Control Bernal
front.ability: HOME: You are always the 1st player, superseding all other claimants.

back.name: Climate Control Lab
back.ability: +2 VP per Dirtside for this Bernal.

front.name: L2 Collimator Bernal
front.ability: HOME: Gain the Powersat faction privilege.

back.name: Collimator Lab
back.ability: Gain the Powersat faction privilege. Powersat push includes a Bonus Pivot.

front.name: L3 Lofstrom Loop Microgravity
front.ability: HOME: Boost direct to Home Bernal without doubling boost costs.

back.name: Lofstrom Loop Microgravity Lab
back.ability: Your factory-assisted landings/liftoffs anywhere treat lander burns as normal Burn Spaces.

front.name: L4 Antimatter Factory
front.ability: HOME: Your Crew has an On-Board Nuclear X reactor.

back.name: Antimatter Lab
back.ability: Your Crew has an On-Board Nuclear "ANY" reactor.

front.name: L4s Pharmaceutics Bernal
front.ability: HOME: Gain the Skunkworks faction privilege.

back.name: Pharmaceutics Lab
back.ability: Gain the Skunkworks faction privilege & impose academia hand limit on all opponents.

front.name: L5 Solar Cell Factory
front.ability: HOME: +1 to the Net Thrust of your Spacecraft that use Solar-Power.

back.name: Solar Cell Lab
back.ability: +2 to the Net Thrust of your Spacecraft that use Solar-Power.

front.name: L5s Cancer Hospital
front.ability: HOME: You are immune to budget cuts.

back.name: Cancer Lab
back.ability: Gain +1 Token VP for each Colony Dome. Your Crew and Human Colonists have a rad-hard of at least 7.

front.name: SSO Diplomatic
front.ability: HOME: (Module 0) Your delegates in the Ideology of your Faction color are +1 VP each.

back.name: Diplomatic Lab
back.ability: (Module 0) Your delegates in the assembly are +1 VP each.

front.name: Tourism Cycler
front.ability: HOME: Can designate any Spacecraft to forgo Belt Rolls in the Radiation Belts near Earth.

back.name: Tourism Hotel
back.ability: +2 VP per Dirtside for this Bernal.
